info.description:
# üöÄIntrodu√ß√£o √†s nossas APIs

A iugu oferece uma interface de programa√ß√£o web no modelo `REST`, permitindo intera√ß√£o eficiente com seu sistema. Com essa API, voc√™ pode executar comandos, verificar configura√ß√µes e sincronizar dados com seus pr√≥prios sistemas.

A comunica√ß√£o √© feita atrav√©s do endere√ßo base [https://api.iugu.com](https://api.iugu.com/), utilizando sempre o protocolo seguro `https://`. As vers√µes da API s√£o organizadas em diret√≥rios espec√≠ficos, sufixados ao endere√ßo base (por exemplo, `https://api.iugu.com/v1`.

# üîêAutentica√ß√£o

A autentica√ß√£o na iugu √© realizada por meio de uma chave de API, que permite ao sistema identificar a sua conta e conceder as permiss√µes necess√°rias para a comunica√ß√£o com a iugu em nome da conta associada. [Saiba mais](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/autentica%C3%A7%C3%A3o).

# üõ†Ô∏èProdu√ß√£o e Teste

A distin√ß√£o de um ambiente de produ√ß√£o ou teste ser√° feita atrav√©s do `api_token` que for utilizado no momento da requisi√ß√£o. [Crie um api_token](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/autentica%C3%A7%C3%A3o#criar-api_token) e utilize de acordo com com sua necessidade.

# üíªIP de sa√≠da da iugu

Para aqueles que fazem controle dos IPs em seu Firewall, por exemplo, considere permitir o `54.207.210.151`.

# ‚ö†Ô∏èTabela de Erros

Disponibilizamos tamb√©m uma tabela dos principais erros e seus motivos para consulta neste [link](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/erros-copy).

# üß™Recipes

Acesse a nossa [biblioteca de Recipes](https://dev.iugu.com/recipes). Um jeito pr√°tico e din√¢mico de como utilizar as nossas APIs para determinados objetivos.

# üìñPagina√ß√£o

Para APIs de listagem, s√£o utilizados par√¢metros de pagina√ß√£o. [Saiba mais](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/pagina%C3%A7%C3%A3o).

# üì£Atualiza√ß√µes

Sempre que uma nova feature ou atualiza√ß√£o acontece, informamos os detalhes em nossa [P√°gina de Atualiza√ß√µes](https://dev.iugu.com/changelog).

# üéØStatus da iugu

Tenha acesso ao status dos servi√ßos da iugu **em tempo real** em [status.iugu.com](https://status.iugu.com/).

# üõüObter suporte

Se precisar de ajuda t√©cnica, entre em contato com o nosso [Suporte T√©cnico](https://support.iugu.com/hc/pt-br/requests/new).

request.description:
### Create Invoice

Creates a new invoice.

- The `email` parameter specifies the email address associated with the invoice.
    
- The `cc_emails` parameter specifies the additional email addresses to be CC'd on the invoice.
    
- The `due_date` parameter specifies the due date of the invoice in the format AAAA-MM-DD.
    
- The `ensure_workday_due_date` parameter ensures that the due date falls on a workday.
    
- The `expires_in` parameter specifies the expiration period for the invoice.
    
- The `bank_slip_extra_due` parameter specifies the extra due date for bank slip payment.
    
- The `items` parameter contains an array of items included in the invoice, with description, quantity, and price details.
    
- The `payable_with` parameter specifies the payment methods accepted for the invoice.
    
- The `payer` parameter contains details about the payer, including name, tax ID, email, phone, and address.
    
- The `splits` parameter contains details about revenue splits, including recipient account ID and percentage.
    
- The `customer_id` parameter specifies the customer ID associated with the invoice.
    
- The `subscription_id` parameter specifies the subscription ID associated with the invoice.
    
- The `return_url` parameter specifies the URL to redirect to after invoice creation.
    
- The `expired_url` parameter specifies the URL to redirect to if the invoice is expired.
    
- The `notification_url` parameter specifies the webhook URL for invoice notifications.
    
- The `ignore_canceled_email` parameter specifies whether to ignore canceled email notifications.
    
- The `fines` parameter specifies whether to apply fines for late payment.
    
- The `late_payment_fine` parameter specifies the late payment fine percentage.
    
- The `per_day_interest` parameter specifies whether to apply per-day interest for late payment.
    
- The `discount_cents` parameter specifies the discount amount in cents.
    
- The `ignore_due_email` parameter specifies whether to ignore due email notifications.
    
- The `custom_variables` parameter contains custom variables with name and value.
    
- The `early_payment_discount` parameter specifies whether to apply early payment discounts.
    
- The `early_payment_discounts` parameter contains details about early payment discounts, including days, percentage, and value.
    
- The `order_id` parameter specifies the order ID associated with the invoice.
    
- The `external_reference` parameter specifies the external reference for the invoice.
    
- The `max_installments_value` parameter specifies the maximum installment value.
    
- The `soft_descriptor_light` parameter specifies the soft descriptor for credit card transactions.
    
- The `pix_qr_code_expires_at` parameter specifies the expiration date for the PIX QR code.
    
- The `pix_remittance_info` parameter specifies the remittance information for PIX payments.
    
- The `pix_additional_info` parameter contains additional information for PIX payments.
    
- The `password` parameter specifies the password for the invoice.
    

[Click here](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/criar-fatura) for more information.

### Response

- The response will contain the details of the newly created invoice.

### Capturar Fatura

This API endpoint is used to capture an invoice with status "em an√°lise" (`in_analysis`) using its ID. For more information on two-step charging, refer to [Cobran√ßa em duas etapas](https://dev.iugu.com/docs/cobran%C3%A7a-em-duas-etapas).

#### Request

- Method: POST
    
- URL: `https://api.iugu.com/v1/invoices/:id/capture?api_token`
    

#### Response

The response for this request can be documented as a JSON schema.

[Reembolsar Fatura (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/reembolsar-fatura)

Efetua o reembolso de uma Fatura. Somente alguns meios de pagamento permitem o reembolso, como por exemplo Cart√£o de Cr√©dito e Pix. Ap√≥s o reembolso, a Fatura fica com o status de "reembolsada", ou "refunded".¬†Reembolso parcial funciona apenas para transa√ß√µes em cart√£o de cr√©dito. [Para mais informa√ß√µes sobre Reembolso de faturas](https://dev.iugu.com/docs/realizar-o-reembolso-de-faturas-estorno-por-api)

[Cancelar Fatura (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/cancelar)

Cancela uma Fatura. O status da fatura n√£o pode ser 'expired' (expirado).

[Gerar 2¬™ Via de Fatura (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/gerar-segunda-via)  
Gera a segunda via de uma fatura com o status "pendente". A fatura atual √© cancelada e uma nova √© criada com o mesmo status.

  
Usando o par√¢metro "current_fines_option"

Se houver configurado multa e juros por atraso na conta iugu, a configura√ß√£o nesse par√¢metro ser√° ignorada, pois o juros e multa aplicado na conta sobrep√µe ao que for aplicado a esse par√¢metro.

FAQ "[Como configurar multa e juros](https://support.iugu.com/hc/pt-br/articles/206974233-Como-configurar-multa-e-juros)"

[Consultar Fatura (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/buscar-fatura)

Retorna os dados de uma Fatura.

request.description:
[Listar/Buscar Faturas (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/listar-faturas)

Retorna uma lista das faturas em sua conta ordenadas pela data de cria√ß√£o, da mais √† menos recente. Por padr√£o, este endpoint retorna no m√°ximo 100 registros. O campo "totalItems" cont√©m sempre a quantidade total de faturas cadastradas, independentemente dos par√¢metros de pesquisa utilizados, e o resultado da pesquisa fica sempre dentro de "items".

[Enviar Fatura por Email (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/enviar-por-email)

Envia a fatura iugu para o email vinculado a ela.

[Considerar Fatura Paga Externamente (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/considerar-fatura-paga-externamente)

Possibilita a baixa de pagamento de uma fatura iugu que foi paga externamente e/ou por outros interm√©dios. Este processo altera o status pendente de uma fatura para "Paga Externamente".

Esta endpoint permite que voc√™¬†**considere uma Fatura Pendente na iugu como Paga**, utilizando um ID externo para refer√™ncia da fatura em algum outro sistema ou base de dados, e permitindo que voc√™ justifique e descreva a baixa do pagamento.

_Utilize esta funcionalidade caso uma fatura tenha sido paga por outros interm√©dios fora da iugu e, com isto, surja a necessidade de realizar a baixa no pagamento em nosso sistema. Voc√™ ir√° precisar do ID da fatura (aqui na iugu) que foi paga externamente._

> 

üöß

Aten√ß√£o!

Muita aten√ß√£o √† utilizar esta fun√ß√£o, pois ap√≥s a fatura ser considerada paga, a mesma ficar√° indispon√≠vel para pagamento na iugu, com o status¬†**Paga Externamente**.  
Ainda sobre este assunto, para esta baixa n√£o haver√° cobran√ßa de tarifa, tendo em vista que o pagamento da fatura n√£o foi processado pela iugu, teve somente uma atualiza√ß√£o manual em seu status.

**Caso de Exce√ß√£o:**  
Se o usu√°rio criar uma fatura e essa mesma for paga (pelo cliente final) e, antes da compensa√ß√£o o status for atualizado para ‚ÄúPago externamente‚Äù, ser√° criada uma nova fatura com o Status ‚ÄúPago‚Äù, e creditado o valor na conta do cliente (consequentemente a cobran√ßa de tarifa);

O token √© gerado para uma transa√ß√£o espec√≠fica, tornando-o ainda mais seguro. ### Cuidado A API de Cria√ß√£o de Token n√£o utiliza a autentica√ß√£o via api_token. ### Alerta de conformidade com PCI Esta chamada API deve ser utilizada apenas em aplica√ß√µes sem compatibilidade com JavaScript como por exemplo aplica√ß√µes m√≥veis. Se voc√™ efetuar esta chamada por dentro de seus servidores estar√° sujeito a uma auditoria do PCI. Para aplica√ß√µes WEB, utilize a gera√ß√£o do token de cart√£o pelo¬†[iugu.js](https://dev.iugu.com/docs/iugu-js)

[Cobran√ßa Direta (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/cobranca-direta)  
Cobran√ßa simples via boleto ou cart√£o de cr√©dito. [Para mais informa√ß√µes sobre cobran√ßa direta](https://dev.iugu.com/docs/diferen%C3%A7a-entre-cobran%C3%A7a-direta-e-fatura)

### POST /charge_two_credit_cards

This endpoint is used to charge two credit cards simultaneously.

# How to Charge with 2 Cards?

Access [this guide](https://dev.iugu.com/docs/cobranca-com-2-cartoes) (on pt-BR) created especially for this endpoint.

---

# Important ‚ö†Ô∏è

- Only for **single invoices** (not compatible with Subscriptions (Recurring)).
    
- **Refund:** It is only possible to refund the **total** amount of the invoice.
    
- **Installments:** Not compatible with installments. Only invoices for immediate payment.
    

#### Request

- Method: POST
    
- URL: `https://api.iugu.com/v1/charge_two_credit_cards`
    
- Headers:
    
    - Content-Type: application/json
        
- { "api_token": "live_api_token", "invoiced_id": "1234567890ABCDEF1234567890ABCD ...", "iugu_credit_card_payment": \[ { "token": "Ac2a7578-41a5-4851-a9c2-6b302c ...", "amount": 500 } \]}
    

#### Response

The response schema for this request is as follows:

request.description:
### Create Payment Booklet

This endpoint allows you to create payment booklets for customers.

#### Request Body

- `customer_id` (string): The ID of the customer.
    
- `installments` (string): The number of installments.
    
- `description` (string): Description of the booklet.
    
- `price_cents` (string): The price in cents.
    
- `invoice_payable_with_pix` (boolean): Indicates if the invoice is payable with PIX.
    
- `custom_instruction` (string): Custom instructions for the booklet.
    
- `started_at` (string): The start date of the booklet.
    
- `invoice_fines_value` (string): The value of invoice fines.
    
- `invoice_per_day_interest` (boolean): Indicates if there is per day interest on the invoice.
    
- `invoice_per_day_interest_value` (string): The value of per day interest on the invoice.
    
- `invoice_early_payment_discount` (boolean): Indicates if there is an early payment discount.
    
- `early_payment_discounts` (object): Object containing the days and percent for early payment discount.
    
- `external_reference` (string): External reference for the booklet.
    
- `ignore_due_email` (boolean): Indicates if due email should be ignored.
    

For example:

``` json
{
  "customer_id": "590259547ED341C78A6DC0D377B4BC ...",
  "installments": "2",
  "description": "Descri√ß√£o do Carn√™",
  "price_cents": "50000",
  "invoice_payable_with_pix": true,
  "custom_instruction": "custom_instruction",
  "started_at": "2024-12-23",
  "invoice_fines_value": "1",
  "invoice_per_day_interest": true,
  "invoice_per_day_interest_value": "1",
  "invoice_early_payment_discount": true,
  "early_payment_discounts": {
    "days": 15,
    "percent": 1
  },
  "external_reference": "text",
  "ignore_due_email": false
}
#### Response
The response will contain the details of the created payment booklet, including the booklet ID, customer ID, and other relevant information.

 ```

request.description:
### Configure Payment Account

This endpoint is used to configure parameters for a payment account on the iugu platform.

**URL**: `https://api.iugu.com/v1/accounts/configuration?api_token=`

**Method**: `POST`

#### Request Body

- `splits` (array): An array of objects containing configuration for revenue splits.
    
    - `recipient_account_id` (string): The recipient account ID for the split.
        
    - `cents` (number): The amount in cents for the split.
        
    - `percent` (number): The percentage for the split.
        
    - `bank_slip_cents` (number): The amount in cents for bank slip split.
        
    - `bank_slip_percent` (number): The percentage for bank slip split.
        
    - `credit_card_cents` (number): The amount in cents for credit card split.
        
    - `credit_card_percent` (number): The percentage for credit card split.
        
    - `pix_cents` (number): The amount in cents for PIX split.
        
    - `pix_percent` (number): The percentage for PIX split.
        
    - `permit_aggregated` (boolean): If `true`, can use `_pecent` and `_cents` parameters on the same request.
        
    - `credit_card_1x_cents` to `credit_card_12x_percent` (number): Amounts and percentages for credit card splits based on installment count.
        
- `auto_withdraw` (boolean): Indicates if auto withdrawal is enabled. Everyday, the customer will
    
- `per_day_interest` (boolean): Indicates if per day interest is enabled.
    
- `fines` (boolean): Indicates if fines are enabled.
    
- `late_payment_fine` (number): The fine amount for late payment.
    
- `auto_advance` (boolean): Indicates if auto advance is enabled.
    
- `auto_advance_type` (string): The type of auto advance.
    
- `auto_advance_option` (number): The auto advance option value.
    
- `bank_slip` (object): Configuration for bank slip payments.
    
    - `active` (boolean): Indicates if bank slip payments are active.
        
    - `extra_due` (number): The extra due amount for bank slip payments.
        
    - `reprint_extra_due` (number): The reprint extra due amount for bank slip payments.
        
- `credit_card` (object): Configuration for credit card payments.
    
    - `active` (boolean): Indicates if credit card payments are active.
        
    - `soft_descriptor` (string): The soft descriptor for credit card payments.
        
    - `installments` (boolean): Indicates if installments are enabled.
        
    - `max_installments` (number): The maximum number of installments.
        
    - `max_installments_without_interest` (number): The maximum number of installments without interest.
        
    - `two_step_transaction` (boolean): Indicates if two-step transaction is enabled.
        
    - `installments_pass_interest` (boolean): Indicates if installments pass interest.
        
    - `two_credit_cards_payment` (boolean): Indicates if two credit cards payment is enabled.
        
- `payment_email_notification` (boolean): Indicates if payment email notification is enabled.
    
- `payment_email_notification_receiver` (string): The receiver for payment email notification.
    
- `early_payment_discount` (boolean): Indicates if early payment discount is enabled.
    
- `early_payment_discounts` (array): An array of objects containing early payment discount details.
    
    - `days` (number): The number of days for the discount.
        
    - `percent` (number): The discount percentage.
        
    - `value_cents` (number): The discount value in cents.
        
- `disabled_withdraw` (boolean): Indicates if withdrawal is disabled.
    
- `customer_minimum_balance_cents` (string): The minimum balance amount that will be reseverd on the customer account.
    

For more details, you can refer to the [Configurar Conta (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/configurar-conta) documentation.

[Configurar Conta (iugu.com)](https://dev.iugu.com/reference/configurar-conta)

request.description:
### Endpoint Description

This endpoint allows the creation of transfer requests with specified details such as scheduled date, transfer type, amount, description, payer information, receiver details, transaction history, and reason code.

### Request Body

- `scheduled_date` (date ‚Äî 'AAAA-MM-DD'): The date on which the transfer is scheduled.
    
- `transfer_type` (string): The type of transfer - TED, PIX, or institutional.
    
- `amount_cents` (int32): The amount in cents to be transferred.
    
- `description` (string): Description of the transfer. Will appear on transfer receipt.
    
- `check_payer` (string): CPF or CNPJ of the payer.
    
- `external_reference` (string): Reference or identifier for the transfer. Won't appear on transfer receipt.
    
- `receiver` (object): Details of the receiver including name, CPF/CNPJ, bank details, and PIX information.
    
    - `name` (string): Name of the receiver.
        
    - `cpf_cnpj` (string): CPF or CNPJ of the receiver.
        
    - `bank` (object): Bank details of the receiver including ISPB, branch, account number, account type, and bank branch digit.
        
        - `ispb` (string): ISPB code of the bank.
            
        - `branch` (string): Branch of the bank.
            
        - `account` (string): Account number.
            
        - `account_type` (string): Type of the account.
            
        - `bank_branch_digit` (string): Bank branch digit if applicable.
            
    - `pix` (object): PIX details of the receiver including type and key.
        
        - `type` (string): Type of the PIX key (CPF, CNPJ, email, etc.).
            
        - `key` (string): The PIX key.
            
- `hist` (string): Transaction history.
    
- `cit` (string): Identifier code of the transfer.
    
- `reason_code` (string): Code indicating the purpose of the transfer.
    

### Response

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "id": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "status": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "created_at": {
      "type": "string"
    },
    "updated_at": {
      "type": "string"
    }
  }
}

 ```
